text: Costin Borc (born 7 May 1965) is a Romanian engineer and economist who was the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Economy, Trade and Tourism in the Cioloș Cabinet. He took office on 17 November 2015.http://gov.ro/en/government/the- cabinet-of-ministers == References == Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:Engineers from Bucharest‎ Category:21st-century Romanian politicians Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Romania Category:Romanian Ministers of Economy Category:Politicians from Bucharest‎
title: Costin Borc
